sentences.en: Don't paw at everything you see.
He removes a thorn from a lion's paw.
sentences.cn: 他从狮子脚掌上拔下一根刺。

sentences.en: He served as a cat's paw.
He shook Keaton's hand with his big paw.
sentences.cn: 他用他的大爪子握了握基顿的手。

sentences.en: I'll fight you with one paw tied behind my back.
sentences.cn: 我会用一只爪子绑在背后跟你们打.

sentences.en: In the middle of the table sat a little dog, shaking its paw and yelping.
sentences.cn: 在桌子中间有一只小狗坐在那儿, 抖着它的爪子,汪汪地叫.

sentences.en: It's evident that he wants to make a cat's paw of you.
She's actually a cat's paw for her boyfriend, poor girl.
sentences.cn: 实际上她只是她男朋友的工具而已, 可怜的孩子.

sentences.en: Simon looked at the White Arrow clutched in his own sweat - grimed paw.
sentences.cn: Simon看看自己满是汗水的手中,握着的那枝白箭.

sentences.en: That is how the term " cat's paw " has come into use.
sentences.cn: 这就是 “ 猫爪子 ” (被利用的人)这一说法的来历.

sentences.en: That old man is always trying to paw me at the pub.
sentences.cn: 那个老男人在酒吧里老想吃我豆腐.

sentences.en: The Boy stood holding the lion's paw in amazement.
sentences.cn: 男孩站在那儿,拖着狮子的前爪愣住了.

sentences.en: The dog give a yelp when I tread on its paw.
sentences.cn: 我踩了那狗的爪子,它丢剧?了一声.

sentences.en: The dogs continued to paw and claw frantically at the chain mesh.
sentences.cn: 那些狗继续用爪子疯狂地抓铁丝网。

sentences.en: Then Mr White said, Why do you want the paw now?
sentences.cn: 接着,怀特先生问, 为什么你现在还要这个爪子 呢 ?

sentences.en: This month alone, my wife and I spent $600 on one Labrador retriever with a bladder infection who needed some kidney tests and $300 on the other one for an injured paw.
sentences.cn: 仅这个月，我和我妻子就为一患膀胱感染而需要肾测试的拉布拉多犬花费了600美元，同时为另外一只爪子受伤的拉布拉多犬支付了300美元。

trans.tran_en: an animal’s foot that has nails or  claw s

trans.tran_cn: 用爪子抓， 用蹄扒； 翻找
trans.tran_en: if an animal paws a surface, it touches or rubs one place several times with its paw

trans.tran_cn: 用爪抓，用蹄触，盘弄，艰苦地行走
